com.apw.apw3

Class SimCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apw.fly2cam.FlyCamera
      • com.apw.apw3.SimCamera

  • public class SimCamera
extends FlyCamera
    FlyCamera Simulator for TrakSim (but different name) Use this for testing in parallel with fly2cam.FlyCamera

    • Method Detail

      • NextFrame

        public boolean NextFrame(byte[] pixels)
        Gets one frame from the (fake) camera by fetching it from TrakSim.
        Overrides:
        NextFrame in class FlyCamera
        Parameters:
        pixels - Fills this array with pixels in Bayer8 encoding
        Returns:
        True if success, false otherwise

      • Finish

        public void Finish()
        Terminate the (fake) camera session. Required by Flir/Pt.Grey drivers to prevent memory leaks.
        Overrides:
        Finish in class FlyCamera

      • Connect

        public boolean Connect(int frameRate)
        Start a new (fake) camera session with the specified frame rate.
        Overrides:
        Connect in class FlyCamera
        Parameters:
        frameRate - =4 for 30 fps, =3 for 15, =2 for 7.5 pfs
        Returns:
        True if success, false otherwise

      • Live

        public boolean Live()
        Tells if this camera is live or fake.
        Overrides:
        Live in class FlyCamera
        Returns:
        false, because this camera is only a fake
